articles.author: Jill Martin
articles.title: Taylor Fritz becomes first American man since 2006 to advance to US Open final, will face No. 1 Jannik Sinner - CNN
articles.description: No American man has won a grand slam singles title since Andy Roddick won the US Open in 2003. Taylor Fritz has the chance to end that drought on Sunday.
articles.content:
No American man has won a grand slam singles title since Andy Roddick won the US Open in 2003. Taylor Fritz has the chance to end that drought.

articles.title: Toronto Kicks Off Battle of the Fall Film Markets - Hollywood Reporter
articles.description: Can TIFF steal the American Film Market’s thunder as the indie film world’s premier place to do business?

articles.title: Sluggish US jobs report clears the way for Federal Reserve to cut interest rates - The Associated Press
